Dracona smiled and leaed back.

"I tell nothing, even with that stuff, I hvae infused my self with anti
laughing...stuff, so forget about it. As for pai? It is my friend." Dracona
said. She rolled her eyes. and just got comfortable in her chair...
----- Original Message -----
From: <logomorph@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, July 20, 2000 7:54 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::DarkMouse:;
>
> "You know, with that attitude, you'll never get anywhere. now let me
> tell you something lizard lips, If I was you, I'd watch it.  I
> unfortunately have the softest spark here.  You'll only find pain and
> suffering when Megatron comes in here.  I sugjest that you be a
> little nicer. Now then, that device, what is it? What does it do? Oh
> you don't have to answer me now.  I suspect you won't.  But I have
> ways to make you talk." She picked up a small vile and waved it so
> Dracona could see it."This stuff is a fun stuff to use.  it make you
> happy. So happy that you will tell me everything and sing like a
> mockingbird.  You'll tell me your deepest, darkest secrets and
> anything else I want to know. So you can talk willingly or I can get
> it out of you later on. It's all up to you."
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > "Okay, rat! I came here to find the device I lost back when that
> idiot
> > Suukie came here and got himself killed! I came back for the device
> because
> > I needed it! And now the device is gone, I hope your happy!" Dracona
> > screamed. She looked down, she was damaged extremely bad. Dracona
> looked
> > back to Dark Mouse menacinly...
>
>
